casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jacqui SMITH Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 31, 2018 Laila M. G. Haswell, senior assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Robert J. Scheinblum, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 715 , 177 A.3d 593 (2017), is denied.
